website_summaries.verdict: These steel fork extensions can lift over a thousand pounds, but their fit over the forks could be better.
pros: High tensile steel construction of 1/4-inch thickness
Extensions held in place by steel retaining straps
Fits forks up to 4 inches wide
cons: The forks fit a little loosely and rattle a bit when in use

customer_reviews.title: Strong, heavy quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my old V50B Cat fork lift as the suppled forks are only 36" long. They are well made and look like they will do the job i need them for. The only thing i will point out and this is not a fault of the extensions, is that when you extend you forks in this manner you will lose some of the lift capability of your forklift. For example my small Cat lifts around 4800lb with the supplied forks. By adding this extension it cuts that figure down considerably. You will probably have to consult your manual or call the forklift manufacturer to get exact figures.
customer_reviews.author: SFXPHIL

customer_reviews.title: Push forks straight under the skids for stability.
customer_reviews.text: The fork extensions should have flat steel under the extensions also to keep them from sliding sideways. I am going to weld a couple of metal strips under the extensions. Then slide on forks. Redesign the loops on back to swing around the back of the forks. It’s just a suggestion I’m going to try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have read the others review and agree that there is a little slop from the extenders being wider than the forks but that is no big deal. The quality of the craftsmanship seems to be good especially for the price. I would recommend others to this product.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Worked Flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to be able to lift up my hot tub and repair the leaking pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my home shop to pick up large parts and work great , safe and easy
customer_reviews.author: miguel licea

customer_reviews.title: WORK AS THEY SHOULD
customer_reviews.text: LIKE THAT THEY ARE EASY TO PUT ON BUT DISLIKE HOW LOOSE THEY ARE. ALMOST NEED TO DRILL A HOLE IN EACH ONE THRU FORKS TO HOLD IN PLACE.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Despins iii

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We got our forklift extension on time for a major job we have, fits well on our forklift.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Needed these for the 6ft skids coming in from customers .they would always pack the heavy side towered the front and with 4ft forks , was a challenge . These showed up quick and we're exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Powderboss

customer_reviews.title: The welded straps bend easy.
customer_reviews.text: They fall off the forks and the welded strap bent. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cola1bear

customer_reviews.title: worth the cost of purchase for the occassional need of longer forks
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. the only reason I withheld the one star is that once they are slid onto the forks, they are still "loose" and rattle a good bit. They would be better if they had a couple of set screws on their side(s) to clamp them onto the front sides of the existing forks. Otherwise, they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Strock

customer_reviews.title: works as designed
customer_reviews.text: Used these extenders to lift five 6x6 box blinds off the ground. They are very sturdy and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They bend because they are a light duty extender...Junk
customer_reviews.text: They are junk, they bent the first time I used them...
customer_reviews.author: Richard Signoracci

customer_reviews.title: arrived a day earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my need. I used them to extend forks on my JD 6403 fork lift to place 25 ft trusses on beams. My forks were 4 ft long; my trusses had a 5 ft pitch from base to peak
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: I use these on an order picker forklift. They fit great and are super strong. Shopping was faster than estimated too.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, well made
customer_reviews.text: Fit over my 4” forks with no problem, well made, good welds & heavy material.

customer_reviews.title: Work Great excellent price
customer_reviews.text: they work juslt liked we needed shipped promptly great price.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how many times I'd use these things in the brewery. Definitely worth the low price. Go for it.

customer_reviews.title: Delivered quickly, new, well priced and fit our ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly, new, well priced and fit our 4" blades well. These are 4.5" wide, so there is a little play in them. They will work well for the intended purpose.

customer_reviews.title: Good Seller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: if your looking for 72" fork extensions your going to get 72" for extensions

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fork extensions at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fork extensions at a great price. I would give them 5 stars but there are several paint chips on the bottom of the part. Not a huge deal since they will eventually get scraped up anyway but its always better to get new parts in without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they do the job I need them for I was happy with them so I ordered a set for each ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set of these I have purchased, they do the job I need them for I was happy with them so I ordered a set for each of my locations
customer_reviews.author: DjH61

product_meta.title: Titan Attachments Pallet Fork Extensions for Forklifts and Loaders, Steel, 72”
product_meta.description:
Pallet fork extensions offer impressive range when it comes to lifting and moving materials. Their added length makes it easier to pick up longer and heftier materials. These extensions are an ideal asset for construction and farming jobs, allowing you to complete tasks more efficiently. These pallet fork extensions by Titan Attachments are made from sturdy high-tensile steel, and their all-steel construction ensures extra durability and longevity. Because they are made with such high quality, these pallet fork extensions will withstand intemperate weather and harsh climate conditions with ease. The steel is 0.25" thick for additional protection. Our pallet fork extensions are compatible with forks that measure up to 4” wide. Our extensions also come with a steel retaining strap to keep the extensions in place. The strap has a loop-style back that keeps the forks firmly attached, so you don’t have to worry about them accidentally falling or slipping off. These pallet fork extensions are 4.5” x 1.75” x 72” and weigh approximately 83 lbs. per pair. With these extensions, you can carry lumber, logs, timber, and firewood. They’ll also help you move and install fence posts. You can even use these pallet fork extensions to clear brush and debris away from your land. This attachment is also great for moving around mounds or bales of hay. Add these extensions to your tractor parts and supplies today to start living your life to the fullest.

Features:
- Quick and simple way to lengthen your forks.
- Steel retaining strap to keep extensions in place.
- High lifting capacity.
- Heavy duty steel construction.
- Fits forks up to 4" wide.

Specifications:
- Weight 83 lbs per pair
- Size: 4.5" x 1.75" x 72"
- Material: 1/4" thick high tensile steel
- Load Capacity: 1,275 LB Per Fork Blade
feature_bullets: EASILY LENGTHENS YOUR BLADES: These pallet fork extensions offer a quick and simple way to extend the length of your blades. They come with a steel retaining strap to keep the extensions in place, so you don’t need to worry about them slipping off. This set of blades doesn’t require tools, making for easy installation.

SPECIFICALLY DESIGNED FOR FORKLIFTS: These pallet fork extensions fit forks up to 4” wide. Just slide the extensions onto your current pallet forks and you’re all set! Additionally, these pallet forks won’t strain or tax your machinery, allowing you to lift larger objects than you would normally be able to with your forklift.

HIGH LIFTING CAPACITY: Sometimes your normal pallet forks just can’t quite get the job done — that’s when these pallet fork extensions come in handy. They’ll provide you with the extra support you’ll need to lift long or large objects. It has a load capacity of 1275 lbs. When you’ve got a big job to do, trust these pallet fork extensions to help you complete the task!

MADE FROM HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL: At Titan, we don’t skimp when it comes to making high-quality products. That’s why our pallet fork extensions are made from high-tensile steel. They measure at 0.25" thick, providing extra protection and reinforcement to your equipment. Because of their heavy-duty steel construction, these extensions won’t rust or corrode, so you can enjoy them for years to come.

DIMENSIONS: These blades measure at 4.5” x 1.75” x 72” and will fit forks up to 4” wide. These pallet forks weigh approximately 83 lbs. per pair. They’re made from 0.25” high-tensile steel. When placing your order, we will need your phone number for the trucking company to schedule delivery.
